summary: DRIVING A N 80WEST  AT 65MPH, LIGHT COMES ON AND SAYS TRANSMISSION HOT/IDLE ENGINE  I PULLED AND LET CAR COOL FOR 30 MINUTES. LIGHT GOES OFF AND I PROCEEDED TO DRIVE AGAIN. AFTER DRIVING ABOUT  15 MINUTES, CAR STARTED ACCELERATE AT A FAST PACE. I PULLED OVER TO SHOULDER AGAIN AND AND WAS TOWED TO GRAY CHEVROLET IN STROUDSBURG, PA. THEY TRIED TO DIAGNOSE PROBLEM BUT SAYS IT  NEVER HAPPENED WHEN THEY DROVE THE CAR. I NOW HAVE TO NOW DRIVE MY CAR HOME NIT KNOWING WHAT HAPPENED TO THE CAR AND IF ITS GOING TO DO IT AGAIN. THEY GAVE ME A LOT OF REASONS WHAT IT COULD BE BUT COULDNT PROVE IT.  SO IT WAS RELEASED BACK TO ME.
